title: Clued up about tyre jargon, SA's electric road trip - Top motoring stories of the week
text:
For the Toyota Corolla fans, there is a cool article about how the sedan has evolved through the years from boy racer to sophisticated family car.

Wheels24 readers Stefan Pansegrouw and Frans Esterhuyse sent in some cool drawings. If you have any drawings you would like to share, feel free to email us.

In case you missed it

An inspiring women's story showcases Suganthi from India who works as one of a few Uber drivers, navigating tough traffic while providing for her family.

READ | Volvo and Geely form stand-alone combustion engine business

There is also a list of the top 5 pre-owned SUVs currently on the market if you can't afford the brand new offerings.

Ernest Page drives along with 10-year-old Max Tuck and he gives his thoughts on a 2017 Jaguar F-Type 400 Sport.

If you're not too clued up about different types of tyre jargon, there is an interesting article explaining everything you need to know.

Click on the links below to read the full article:
description: Here are all the top motoring stories of the week in case you might have missed them.
